page.title: 19 HOME LIFE
page.content: My dad goes to work at 8:45a.m.He works at Theakston's sometimes or just odd jobs around Masham.My mum goes to work at 9:00 a.m.My mum works at Richmond as a psychiatric nurse.Kevin aged 16 goes to Northallerton Grammar School.At 7:40a.m.Marianne aged 14 goes to Bedale at 8:15a.m and I go to Masham C.of E. School at 8:30a.m.We have two cats and one dog. Every day after school I take Tobi for a walk and do the drying up.My mum comes in at 5:30 and my dad comes in at 6:00 p.m.We have tea at about 6:15.After tea on a Wednesday I go to badminton.My mum does badminton with Mrs.Marr.After badminton I go home to watch television.On Saturdays I have my breakfast and watch Saturday Superstore.My sister does the cleaning and my brother goes'beating'on the moors for grouse shooting.
